He is the co-founder and CEO of Circle, a financial technology company that focuses on digital currency and blockchain technology. Circle is best known for its stablecoin, USD Coin (USDC), which is a type of cryptocurrency designed to have a stable value tied to the US dollar. This interview was recorded during EthCC[7].
